name: WP LogInOut
author: Nabtron

sections.description:
The plugin uses the wp_loginout functionality and extends it to automatically show login or logout button on your selected menu.

The status of login or logout changes depending upon the users login status.

The admin panel provides options to:

  1. select theme location for menu you want to extend
  2. code before and after the button link (<li> and </li> usually)

Please let us know if you encounter any bug or want features added to this plugin here on forums or at : Nabtron
sections.installation:
1. Upload wp-loginout.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
  3. configure settings for the plugin from left menu > themes > WP Login / Logout
sections.faq:
Can this plugin be modified?

Yes we can, contact us through forums here or our website: https://nabtron.com

short_description: Show login or logout button on any menu based on user login or logout status dynamically.
